alert.note: Alert for Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 2:55AM MST until December 31 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 14 inches with locally higher amounts. Wind gusting 35 to 45 mph. * WHERE...Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Friday. The steadiest snow is expected this afternoon into this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult over mountain passes where patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions may impact the commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
